column1: 98777036$Tragoedia$Unlimited$DARK$[Fiend/Effect]$$$$$10$?$?$$$$When you take battle damage: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. Gains 600 ATK/DEF for each card in your hand. Once per turn: You can send 1 monster from your hand to the GY
column2: then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls with the same Level the sent monster had in the hand; take control of that face-up monster. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster in your GY; this card's Level becomes the same as that target's
column3: until the end of this turn.$$$Activates if you take battle damage/Activates from your hand/Sends from your hand to your Graveyard for cost/Changes control$Trigger/Continuous/Ignition$
